segments.text: I'd like to order a bottle of champagne , lobster tail , and filet mignon , medium rare .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . We're currently out of filet mignon . May I suggest the porterhouse instead ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd prefer the filet , but the porterhouse will do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And may I suggest chocolate-covered strawberries with the champagne ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Normally , I would take you up on that suggestion , but just the champagne will do for tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , no strawberries . Room service will be charged to your amenities account . Is that all right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It will be up shortly . Enjoy your food , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
